devdoc.author: Babylon Finance Executes a add liquidity operation

params._asset: Asset to receive into this operation
params._capital: Amount of asset received param _assetStatus        Status of the asset amount
params._integration: Address of the integration to execute
params._pool: Address of the pool to enter

params._percentage: of capital to exit from the strategy

devdoc.title: AddLiquidityOperation

getNAV(address,address,address).notice: Gets the NAV of the add liquidity op in the reserve asset

getName().notice: Returns the name of the operation

validateOperation(address,address,addres.notice: Sets operation data for the add liquidity operation
